cause.description:
Because of the constant growth in population throughout the world, many animals are feeling the effects. Although deer are nowhere near extinct, this does not mean that they can be thrown around, shot, and hit by cars. They are beautiful creatures, and need a place, just as humans, to reside.
1. Deer need a safe place away from humans
2. Thousands of deer die everyday through hunting
cause.mission: Enable all deer to have clean and spacious habitats
cause.name: Save The Deer
